short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A perfect new Flowers themed new tab extension for your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the background image on new tabs to feature cool Flowers and Flowers related images! The extension also provides users with a Custom Web Search on the New Tab.

By installing "Flowers Tab" extension, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, and to set your new tab page to Flowers Background.

The search features used within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing. However, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.

Free stock media content is distributed by Unsplash - https://unsplash.com

Privacy Policy: https://flowerstab.xyz/Privacy-Policy.html

EULA/Terms of Service: https://flowerstab.xyz/Terms-Of-Use.html
